name: R4B-Consent-R5-Consent
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B Consent into FHIR R5

element.display: A healthcare consumer's  choices to permit or deny recipients or roles to perform actions for specific purposes and periods of time

target.display: A healthcare consumer's  or third party's choices to permit or deny recipients or roles to perform actions for specific purposes and periods of time
target.comment: R4B `Consent` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Consent`

element.display: Classification of the consent statement - for indexing/retrieval

target.display: Classification of the consent statement - for indexing/retrieval
target.comment: R4B `Consent.category` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Consent.category` - category changed the binding strength from Extensible to Example
R4B `Consent.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Consent.contained`

element.display: When this Consent was created or indexed

target.comment: R4B `Consent.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Consent.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `Consent.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Consent.id`
R4B `Consent.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Consent.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `Consent.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Consent.implicitRules`
R4B `Consent.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Consent.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0
R4B `Consent.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Consent.meta`

R4B `Consent.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Consent.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Who is agreeing to the policy and rules
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Specific policy covered by this consent

target.comment: R4B `Consent.provision` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Consent.provision` - provision changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *)
R4B `Consent.provision.action` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Consent.provision.action`

element.display: Who|what controlled by this rule (or group, by role)

target.display: Who|what controlled by this provision (or group, by role)
target.comment: R4B `Consent.provision.actor` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Consent.provision.actor`

R4B `Consent.provision.actor.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Consent.provision.actor.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `Consent.provision.actor.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Consent.provision.actor.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `Consent.provision.actor.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Consent.provision.actor.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Resource for the actor (or group, by role)

target.display: Resource for the actor (or group, by role)
target.comment: R4B `Consent.provision.actor.reference` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Consent.provision.actor.reference`
R4B `Consent.provision.actor.role` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Consent.provision.actor.role`

element.display: e.g. Resource Type, Profile, CDA, etc.
e.g. LOINC or SNOMED CT code, etc. in the content

target.display: e.g. LOINC or SNOMED CT code, etc. in the content
target.comment: R4B `Consent.provision.code` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Consent.provision.code`
R4B `Consent.provision.data` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Consent.provision.data`

R4B `Consent.provision.data.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Consent.provision.data.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `Consent.provision.data.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Consent.provision.data.id`

R4B `Consent.provision.data.meaning` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Consent.provision.data.meaning` - meaning has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/consent-data-meaning|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/consent-data-meaning|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `Consent.provision.data.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Consent.provision.data.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `Consent.provision.data.reference` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Consent.provision.data.reference`

element.display: Timeframe for data controlled by this rule

target.display: Timeframe for data controlled by this provision
target.comment: R4B `Consent.provision.dataPeriod` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Consent.provision.dataPeriod`
R4B `Consent.provision.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Consent.provision.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `Consent.provision.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Consent.provision.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `Consent.provision.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Consent.provision.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `Consent.provision.period` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Consent.provision.period`
R4B `Consent.provision.provision` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Consent.provision.provision`

element.display: Context of activities covered by this rule

target.display: Context of activities covered by this provision
target.comment: R4B `Consent.provision.purpose` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Consent.provision.purpose`

element.display: Security Labels that define affected resources

target.display: Security Labels that define affected resources
target.comment: R4B `Consent.provision.securityLabel` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Consent.provision.securityLabel` - securityLabel changed the binding strength from Extensible to Example

element.display: Which of the four areas this resource covers (extensible)
Source from which this consent is taken
draft | proposed | active | rejected | inactive | entered-in-error

target.display: draft | active | inactive | not-done | entered-in-error | unknown
target.comment: R4B `Consent.status` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Consent.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/consent-state-codes|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/consent-state-codes|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `Consent.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Consent.text`

element.display: Consent Verified by patient or family

target.display: Consent Verified by patient or family
target.comment: R4B `Consent.verification` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Consent.verification`

R4B `Consent.verification.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Consent.verification.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `Consent.verification.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Consent.verification.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `Consent.verification.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Consent.verification.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `Consent.verification.verificationDate` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Consent.verification.verificationDate` - verificationDate changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *)
R4B `Consent.verification.verified` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Consent.verification.verified`
R4B `Consent.verification.verifiedWith` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Consent.verification.verifiedWith`
